1.title: Gettin started

14.content: Where do you start in time of the series?
14.title: START OR END?

142.content: It has been two years after Dr.Tenma's incarsrasion and all has been peacful for our hero Astro. Sure there was the ecesonal bank robbery but nothing to sever. But with all of this peace Astro has to fight a great enemy; BORDOM!!!!!! "What to do, what to do" Astro said to him self " My human friends are at mami for the summer." It was then that Zoran ran through and said.....
142.title: End

1422.content: "Hey Astro Dr.O'shay needs to talk to you.""Thanks Zoran" said Astro as he ran to the Doctor. "Hello Astro, glad to see you"." What's up Dr.O'shay"." I need you to investigate a strange anomaly that has been found in South Africa.""why me" because the anomaly is a tramamadous amout of radition in the moutains"."Right Doctor"said Astro as he flew off. When he arived therewas a small metal sphare "I better cheack this out". As he entered the base he found strange diagrams on the walls but soon he found him self face to face with........
1422.title: The plot thickens

14221.content: "What a strange place" said Astro as walked up to the strange man. "Hello sir I need to talk to you." The man turned around and said "Ah, Astro what a suprise what is it that you need.""Well sir there is too much radation outside and.....""say no more Astro I'll fix this" said the man as he started to type on the computer. Soon Astro got a call on his comuicator "Well done Astro, the radation has disipated" All right" said Astro as he hanged up"Thanks for the help Mr...." "OH, sorry I forgot to introduce myself" he said as he hit his head. "I am Dr. Tennson, proud robo-gentic enginer." "Robo-genetic" asked Astro confused."I work at giving robots DNA." "Wow"said Astro "But what's with the radation."" Forgive me but some of my expiriments create a lot of radition, normaly I have filters but they somtimes stop working, that's why I'm out here" Astro was about to ask him somthing when.............
14221.title: Somthing New

142211.content: Soon an alarm was heard through out the base. "Oh no, it's them."" How's them doctor" asked Astro. "The Evolved, a group of evil super soldiers hell bent on rulling the univeres "." Can I help" " I was just about to ask Astro"." Great lets Rocket" "Hold on Astro you'll need this" said Dr.Tennson as he handed Astro a gontlant. "What's this thing" "That gontlant will increase your power ten fold" "Wow Thanks" said Astro as he flew off. When he reached the outside there was.........
142211.title: What no Earth

1422111.content: What Astro was expaticing was not what he saw. Before him was Anthro animals armed with guns. The leader, who wadestorede tiger, made her demans. "We want the man inside, leave now or be destored ."" I wont let that happen" "Then die with him." She then gave the order to attack and soon the fight began. Astro held up his own but their were to many of them. But soon some one else joined the fight......
1422111.title: The Evovled

info.brief_description: An interactive Astro Boy story in any form, manga or anime.
info.description:
Astro Boy, a super-powerful android with all the powers and strength of a supreme robotic warrior, but the heart and emotion of a peaceful human boy. Created by Dr. Tenma as a robotic reincarnation of his deceased son Tobio and given every bit of cutting edge defense and weapons technology so as to prevent him ever dying again.

Although Tenma took to this robo-Tobio for a time, he soon grew dissatisfied with how the android developed to be unlike his son; and of course the fact that as a robot it couldn't grow. As such he abandoned his creation in a display of cruelty and vanished from society.

Robo-Tobio would be discovered later by Tenma's old associate Dr. Ochanomizu (Dr. O'shay for short, or sometimes Dr. Elefun in reference to his large nose). Upon discovery Dr. Ochanomizu adopted the android as his own and renamed him Astro and taught him the virtues of peace, kindness and justice.

From then on Astro used his extraordinary abilities to save people and robots alike.

---

This interactive is really for only Astro Boy fans. Each branch will be based on one of the forms of Astro Boy media. Manga, 60's anime, 80's anime, 2003 anime and 2009 movie. Each basically carries on from the end of the official version and it's up to you how they play out.

I don't think I need to post rules. Just have fun and make it Astro Boy-ish.
